patterns: Who is your founder?
When was your company started?
what is code karo yaaro?
where is main branch of code karo yaaro
company details
responses: Manish Motghare founded Code Karo Yaaro in the year 2020. Code karo yaaro is Nagpur based company with a vision to make every child literate in computer science and to generate a caliber of coding to enhance life experience. We want to develop the thinking ability of every child, by advancing computer science with new technologies and supporting them for a bright future.
